TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISnapinAbout

Docs.summary: Allows the console to get copyright and version information and images for the static folder from a snap-in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about programming with the ISnapinAbout interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetProvider([out] native int& pName) cil managed
Public Sub GetProvider (ByRef pName As IntPtr)

Docs.param: A return value that contains the provider name of the snap-in. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Docs.summary: Obtains the provider name of the snap-in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about programming with the <xref:Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.ISnapinAbout> interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetSnapinDescription([out] native int& lpDescription) cil managed
Public Sub GetSnapinDescription (ByRef lpDescription As IntPtr)

Docs.param: A return value that contains the text for the description box on an About property page. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Docs.summary: Allows the console to get the text for the description box on the About property page for the snap-in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about programming with the <xref:Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.ISnapinAbout> interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetSnapinImage([out] native int& hAppIcon) cil managed
Public Sub GetSnapinImage (ByRef hAppIcon As IntPtr)

Docs.param: A return value that contains the handle to the main icon of the snap-in used by the About property page. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Docs.summary: Allows the console to get the main icon that is used in the About property page for a snap-in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about programming with the <xref:Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.ISnapinAbout> interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetSnapinVersion([out] native int& lpVersion) cil managed
Public Sub GetSnapinVersion (ByRef lpVersion As IntPtr)

Docs.param: A return value that contains text specifying the version number for the snap-in. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Docs.summary: Allows the console to get the version number for the snap-in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about programming with the <xref:Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.ISnapinAbout> interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetStaticFolderImage (out IntPtr hSmallImage, out IntPtr hSmallImageOpen, out IntPtr hLargeImage, out int cMask);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetStaticFolderImage([out] native int& hSmallImage, [out] native int& hSmallImageOpen, [out] native int& hLargeImage, [out] int32& cMask) cil managed
Public Sub GetStaticFolderImage (ByRef hSmallImage As IntPtr, ByRef hSmallImageOpen As IntPtr, ByRef hLargeImage As IntPtr, ByRef cMask As Integer)

public: void GetStaticFolderImage([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] IntPtr % hSmallImage, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] IntPtr % hSmallImageOpen, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] IntPtr % hLargeImage, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % cMask);

Docs.param: A return value that contains the handle to a small icon (16 x 16 pixels) in either the scope or results view pane.
A return value that contains the handle to a small open folder icon (16 x 16 pixels).
A return value that contains the handle to a large icon (32 x 32 pixels).
A return value that contains a structure that specifies the color used to generate a mask.
Docs.summary: Allows the console to get the static folder images for the scope and results panes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about programming with the <xref:Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.ISnapinAbout> interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
